mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, account, real_name, password, phone, sex, address, create_time, update_time) values (#{id}, #{account}, #{real_name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{address}, #{create_time}, #{update_time})
mapper.update: update t_user set account = #{account}, real_name = #{real_name}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone}, sex = #{sex}, address = #{address}, create_time = #{create_time}, update_time = #{update_time} where id = #{id}
